languages.text: {n}Иокаста склоняется еще ниже, словно надеясь разглядеть под вашими сапогами свою растоптанную гордость.{/n} "Прошу прощения, Лорд-капитан, и благодарю за ваше милосердие".
{n}She bows even lower, as if hoping to find her trampled pride beneath your boot.{/n} "I beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain, and I thank you for your mercy."
languages.original_text: {n}Иокаста склоняется еще ниже, словно надеясь разглядеть под вашими сапогами свою растоптанную гордость.{/n} "Прошу прощения, Лорд-капитан, и благодарю за ваше милосердие".

traits.locale_text: {n}She bows even lower, as if hoping to see her trampled pride under your boot.{/n} "I beg forgiveness, Lord Captain, and thank you for your mercy."

{n}She bows even lower, as if hoping to find her trampled pride beneath your boot.{/n} "I beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain, and I thank you for your mercy."

languages.text: {n}Se inclina aún más, como si esperara encontrar su orgullo pisoteado bajo tu bota.{/n} «Le ruego que me perdone, Lord Capitán, y agradezco su piedad».
languages.original_text: {n}She bows even lower, as if hoping to find her trampled pride beneath your boot.{/n} "I beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain, and I thank you for your mercy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se inclina aún más, como si esperara encontrar su orgullo pisoteado bajo tu bota.{/n} «Le ruego que me perdone, Lord Capitán, y agradezco su piedad».

languages.text: {n}あなたの靴で踏みにじられたプライドを見つけようとするかのように、彼女は頭をさらに低く下げる。{/n}「お許しください、ロード・キャプテン。そして、ご慈悲に感謝します」
languages.original_text: {n}She bows even lower, as if hoping to find her trampled pride beneath your boot.{/n} "I beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain, and I thank you for your mercy."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの靴で踏みにじられたプライドを見つけようとするかのように、彼女は頭をさらに低く下げる。{/n}「お許しください、ロード・キャプテン。そして、ご慈悲に感謝します」

languages.text: {n}她的身子弓得更低了，似乎试图在你的靴子下面找到她遭到践踏的尊严。{/n}“我恳求您的原谅，舰长大人。我感谢您的仁慈。”
languages.original_text: {n}She bows even lower, as if hoping to find her trampled pride beneath your boot.{/n} "I beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain, and I thank you for your mercy."

traits.locale_text: {n}她的身子弓得更低了，似乎试图在你的靴子下面找到她遭到践踏的尊严。{/n}“我恳求您的原谅，舰长大人。我感谢您的仁慈。”

languages.text: {n}Sie verbeugt sich noch tiefer, als hoffe sie darauf, ihren zertrampelten Stolz unter deinem Stiefel wiederzufinden.{/n} "Ich bitte um Eure Vergebung, Lord Captain, und danke Euch für Eure Gnade."
languages.original_text: {n}She bows even lower, as if hoping to find her trampled pride beneath your boot.{/n} "I beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain, and I thank you for your mercy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie verbeugt sich noch tiefer, als hoffe sie darauf, ihren zertrampelten Stolz unter deinem Stiefel wiederzufinden.{/n} "Ich bitte um Eure Vergebung, Lord Captain, und danke Euch für Eure Gnade."

languages.text: {n}Elle s'incline d'autant plus bas, comme si elle espérait trouver sa fierté piétinée sous votre botte.{/n} « Je vous prie de me pardonner, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, et je vous remercie pour votre miséricorde. »
languages.original_text: {n}She bows even lower, as if hoping to find her trampled pride beneath your boot.{/n} "I beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain, and I thank you for your mercy."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elle s'incline d'autant plus bas, comme si elle espérait trouver sa fierté piétinée sous votre botte.{/n} « Je vous prie de me pardonner, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, et je vous remercie pour votre miséricorde. »

languages.text: {n}Sanki kaybettiği gururunu ayakkabılarının altında bulmayı umuyormuş gibi yerlere kadar eğiliyor.{/n} "Affınızı diliyorum Lord Kaptan. Ayrıca gösterdiğiniz merhamet için teşekkür ediyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}She bows even lower, as if hoping to find her trampled pride beneath your boot.{/n} "I beg your forgiveness, Lord Captain, and I thank you for your mercy."
